ul.li1: titleA song for the ascents.The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm
1I lift up my eyes to the mountains;
3He will not allow your foot to be moved;
he who protects you will not slumber.
4Look, he will not slumber and he will not sleep—
Yahweh is your shade at your right hand.
6The sun will not strike you by day,
7Yahweh will protect you from all evil;Or “all calamity”
8Yahweh will protect your going out and your coming in
